examples.example: 我今天买了一把水灵灵的苦菊，准备做一道清爽的菜肴。

translate.english: I bought a fresh and tender endive today and am going to make a refreshing dish.

examples.example: 我妈妈用苦菊做了一道色香味俱佳的凉拌菜，大家都很喜欢。

translate.english: My mother made a cold dish with chicory that has excellent color, aroma and taste, and everyone likes it very much.

examples.example: 我在市场看到水灵灵的苦菊，想着用它做沙拉一定很棒。

translate.english: I saw fresh and tender chicory in the market and thought it would be great to make salad with it.
